summary: Zepbound quarterly revenue Q1 2024 - Q3 2025: showing strong growth from $517M to $3,588M
content:
Historical Zepbound revenue in million USD:
- Q1 2024: 517.4
- Q2 2024: 1,243.3  
- Q3 2024: 1,257.8
- Q4 2024: 1,907.2
- Q1 2025: 2,311.9
- Q2 2025: 3,381.4
- Q3 2025: 3,588.1

Key patterns:
- Strong YoY growth: Q3 2025 was 185% higher than Q3 2024
- Seasonal pattern: Q4 tends to be stronger than Q3 (Q4 2024 was 52% higher than Q3 2024)
- Growth slowing but still significant: Q3 2025 was only 6% higher than Q2 2025

2025 annual guidance: $58-61 billion total company revenue
